law.catch_line: Persons entitled to file initial financing statement or continuation statement.
law.text:
A person may file an initial financing statement or a continuation statement under this part of this article if:
The secured party of record authorizes the filing; and
The filing is necessary under this part of this article:
To continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before July 1, 2001; or
To perfect or continue the perfection of a security interest.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 154, effective July 1, 2001.
